iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Serbia
iati-activity.description: The activities of the project " Year of Biodiversity" include: 1.Equipping the educational paths in Biosphere Reservation Golija and Special Nature Reservation "Uvac" 2. Equipping educational parks in City Kraljevo, Ivanjica and Nova Varos. 3. Training of primary school students about biodiversity and its conservation and the role of citizens in it 4. Training of primary school students about composting, 5. Organizing the eco; 6. Improving the capacities of local associations; 7.Promotion of protection and improvement of biodiversity; 8. Organization Biodiversity days to Biosphere Reserve. Projectâ€™s target groups are: pupils from primary and secondary schools from Municipalities Ivanjica and Nova VaroÅ¡ and City Kraljevo (estimated number is around 450 pupils), youth ecologists from the region of Balkan (estimated number is 20 representatives from ecological organizations).
